---
title: "About us"
---
We are three graduate students currently pursuing \Masters in Data Analytics\ at \George Mason University\. Our team is dedicated to using data-driven approaches to explore and analyze trends, with a particular focus on health and wellness.



## Sushanth Buddhala 

Sushanth passionate about leveraging data science to solve complex problems. With a background in computer science, he brings strong analytical and programming skills to our team.

## Sumanth Veluvolu

Sumanth has a keen interest in statistical modeling and machine learning. He is enthusiastic about using data to make meaningful insights that can positively impact society.

## Vivek Atchutanna

Vivek focuses on data visualization and transforming raw data into actionable insights. His expertise lies in using visual analytics to tell compelling stories from data.
